p: Labdane diterpenoid (e.g., leonurine), extracted from L. japonicus, exhibited cytotoxicity and cell cicle arrest against cancer cell lines and presented immunomodulatory and antinflammatory activities (suppresses TNF- α, NF-κB, and down-regulated expression of iNOS, COX2, and conseguently PEG2 and NO levels) [ 216].
